document.full_text: security forces deployed in a suburb of the syrian capital and in the city of banias on tuesday, witnesses said, even as president bashar al-assad drew international criticism for sending in tanks to crush a revolt.
document.title: european governments condemn syria
lines_and_colors: security forces deployed in a suburb of the syrian capital and in the city of banias on tuesday, witnesses said, even as president bashar al-assad drew international criticism for sending in tanks to crush a revolt.
